Class DBCustomers

DBAccess.DBCustomers
public class DBCustomers extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    addCustomer(Customers customer)
    Takes a Customers object passed from the Add Customer screen, extracts its values, and adds a new row to the customers table of the database populated with these values.
    static boolean
    deleteCustomer(int custID)
    Deletes customer matching the customer ID passed in from the main screen, after checking whether the chosen customer has any appointments remaining in the database and removing them if any are found and the user confirms the deletion.
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers>
    getAllCustomers()
    Gets all rows from the customers table of the database and creates a Customers object for each row.
    static void
    modifyCustomer(Customers customerToMod)
    Takes a Customers object passed from the Modify Customer screen, extracts its values, and updates the corresponding database row with these values.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBCustomers

      public DBCustomers()

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> getAllCustomers()
      Gets all rows from the customers table of the database and creates a Customers object for each row. The objects are then added to an ObservableList for use elsewhere in the application.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList cList containing objects for all customers.

    • addCustomer

      public static int addCustomer(Customers customer)
      Takes a Customers object passed from the Add Customer screen, extracts its values, and adds a new row to the customers table of the database populated with these values. After the customer is generated in the database, the ID for the customer is returned and stored in the newCustID variable.
      Parameters:
      customer - the Customers object passed in from the Add Customer screen.
      Returns:
      int newCustID - the ID for the new customer as auto-generated by the database.

    • deleteCustomer

      public static boolean deleteCustomer(int custID)
      Deletes customer matching the customer ID passed in from the main screen, after checking whether the chosen customer has any appointments remaining in the database and removing them if any are found and the user confirms the deletion.
      Parameters:
      custID - the customer ID to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean isDeleted - true if the customer was successfully deleted, false if it was not.

    • modifyCustomer

      public static void modifyCustomer(Customers customerToMod)
      Takes a Customers object passed from the Modify Customer screen, extracts its values, and updates the corresponding database row with these values.
      Parameters:
      customerToMod - the Customers object passed in from the Modify Customer screen.
